headline: Disney to Unify Marketing Efforts Into New Centralized Unit
summary: Asad Ayaz will lead the unit as chief marketing and brand officer, reporting to Chief Executive Officer Bob Iger, the company said.

headline: The Walt Disney Company Establishes New Enterprise Marketing Organization; Names Asad Ayaz Chief Marketing and Brand Officer
summary: BURBANK, Calif., January 14, 2026--The Walt Disney Company (NYSE: DIS) today announced the creation of a new enterprise marketing and brand organization designed to align the companyâ€™s industry-leading marketing teams more closely across its businesses and strengthen how Disney connects with consumers around the world. Asad Ayaz has been named Chief Marketing and Brand Officer of The Walt Disney Company and will lead the organization.

headline: Fubo Announces Repurchase of $140.2 Million of Its 3.25% Convertible Senior Notes Due 2026
summary: NEW YORK, January 14, 2026--FuboTV Inc. (NYSE: FUBO) today announced the repurchase of $140.2 million aggregate principal amount of its outstanding 3.25% Convertible Senior Notes due 2026.

headline: Netflix Ad-Tier Growth Accelerates: Is the Stock Finally Breaking Out?
summary: NFLX's ad-supported tier is surging, with 190M monthly viewers, a record ad quarter, and plans to double ad revenues in 2025.

headline: Netflix Q4 2025 Earnings Preview: Warner Bros. Discovery Bid Takes Priority
summary: Netflix, Inc.'s Q4 2025 earnings release is likely to be overshadowed by the Warner Bros. Discovery transaction. Read why NFLX stock is a Sell.
